DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics IV administer ERB-257 single ascending dos healthy Japanese male subject
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Ascending Single IV Doses ERB-257 Healthy Japanese Males
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy Japanese men age 20 50 . 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 17.6 26.4 kg/m2 body weight great equal 45 kg2 . 3 . Have high probability compliance completion study . 1 . Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . 2 . Acute disease state ( eg , nausea , vomit , infection , fever , diarrhea ) within 7 day study day 1 .
